ch.bfh.bti7301.hs2013.gravis.core

Interface ICore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Core

    public interface ICore
    This interface gives access to all important core classes. It is a facade to different other classes and interfaces (facade pattern).
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch), Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
